8cf50432-96fd-4025-9ced-a6e51f6051e2.description: The course objective is for teachers to expand their practical and theoretical knowledge of exceptional education, with a person-centered approach to the lives of people with exceptionalities in the twenty-first century.
8cf50432-96fd-4025-9ced-a6e51f6051e2.name: Human Exceptionality(v.1)

issuer.summary: issued by The Alternative Dispute Resolution Academy

badge_template_activities.title: The methods of assessment include presentations, quizzes, with a minimum passing score of 70%.
Instructional strategies include: audio visual materials, case studies, discussion, learner presentations, lectures.

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 3 college credits. For more information about ACE Learning Evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

958e846f-086c-4ec7-b572-4676b2e1268e.description: The course objective is for teachers to expand their knowledge of assessment with regards to the special needs classroom or inclusive classroom. Students will be able to identify and evaluate the appropriateness of various assessment formats.
958e846f-086c-4ec7-b572-4676b2e1268e.name: Assessment in Special and Inclusive Education(v.1)

5bbc5e43-98d8-4819-a917-63b067556002.description: The course objective is to prepare students as legal secretaries or legal assistants. The course provides the knowledge, skills, and ethical reasoning necessary to enter the job market as a legal secretary or legal assistant. Students will study topics such as legal terminology; legal process; jurisdiction and venue; ethics; written communications, including letters, pleadings, discovery, notices, and motions; filing procedures, legal research; memoranda preparation, and citation format.
5bbc5e43-98d8-4819-a917-63b067556002.name: Legal Assistance Certificate Program(v.1)

issuer.summary: issued by The Alternative Dispute Resolution Academy

f091b2fd-f537-4320-9a40-3b4c3e6938d6.description: The course objective is for teachers to expand their practical and theoretical knowledge of autism, with a focus on educating students at the lower functioning end of the spectrum.
f091b2fd-f537-4320-9a40-3b4c3e6938d6.name: Exceptional Student Education: Lower Functioning Autism(v.1)

673b124d-fd7a-413b-b589-c820df1989e3.description: The course objective is to equip participants with knowledge and skills essential to serve as employment mediators. A comprehensive blend of substantive employment law and training in mediation process and skills prepares participants to become qualified mediators for employment disputes. The program has three parts. The first four out of nine modules focus on substantive employment and labor laws. The remaining modules focus on meditation practices and related rules and policies.
673b124d-fd7a-413b-b589-c820df1989e3.name: Employment Labor Law Mediation Certificate Course(v.1)

d2c95f08-f9a1-4f32-9382-bce1c565b840.description: The course objective is to help students understand how to use methods and techniques that every special education and general education teacher should know in order to reach students of varying disabilities.
d2c95f08-f9a1-4f32-9382-bce1c565b840.name: High Incidence Disabilities: Methods and Strategies(v.1)
